synopsis.text: Son Goku's father, Bardock, a humble Saiyan warrior, finds himself bestowed with an extraordinary ability to glimpse into the future after an encounter with an alien during a conquest mission. Initially dismissing the chilling visions of his race's annihilation, Bardock soon realizes their grim authenticity as he witnesses the prophecies unfold before his eyes. In a desperate bid to thwart the impending doom orchestrated by the ruthless Frieza, Bardock embarks on a mission to alter the fate of his people and his home world. This thrilling tale unveils the untold story behind Son Goku's arrival on Earth and his father's heroic struggle against destiny.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
